Settings.Name: Filename
Settings.Description:
The filename of the preset to save or load.
Presets are stored in "%localappdata%/Larian Studios/Baldur's Gate 3/Script Extender/CharacterAppearancePresets".

Settings.Name: Save Preset
Settings.Description: Save the preset of the currently selected character. Can only be used in-game.

ConfirmDialog.Title: Save Preset
ConfirmDialog.Message: This may overwrite your existing file.

Settings.Name: Load Preset
Settings.Description:
Load an existing preset. Can be used in-game or during character creation.
If used during character creation, changes will only become visible once in the nautiloid.
During character creation, editing the appearance of your character after loading the preset will reset their appearance.
